short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts Jenkins server time to the user's local timezone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension which converts all times displayed on a Jenkins server to the user's local timezone. Jenkins displays all times in the server timezone, and allows the user no option to display them in their own timezone. This app solves that problem. It does not modify console output, only the times displayed in Jenkins web pages. It is powered by moment.js. 

This project is open source, the source can be found on GitHub: https://github.com/colmlg/jenkins-local-time

The logo for this project is an adapted version of the Jenkins logo, available under the  Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. Please visit https://jenkins.io/ for more info.
